title: R Butts R Smokin - Ozark Heat Championship BBQ Seasoning - Large 14 oz
description: R Butts R Smokin' Ozark Heat Championship BBQ Dry Rub Seasoning 14 oz Large Bottle - Barbecue Grill and Cooking Spice. Ozark Heat is a unique blend of spices that has helped win numerous BBQ championships. Ozark Heat is a perfect BBQ rub for pork and pork ribs. This rub will bring out the natural flavor of pork. It starts off sweet with some back end heat. This rub features a perfect balance of sweet and heat. This rub helped the R Butts R Smokin' team win the Reserve Grand Championship at the American Royal, and has helped numerous teams win many first place pork calls and Grand Championships all over the country. This rub is perfect on both pork shoulder and ribs or anywhere you want classic barbecue flavor.
